title: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work. Description: When trying to set the color to orange, it doesn't work.
OB: There is no observed behavior mentioned in the bug report.
EB: Expected behavior is that the color should appear as orange.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.
3. Observe that the color does not appear as orange.
